title: Build a Data Pipeline
description: Use iterator helpers to process a stream of user data efficiently.
instructions: Create a function that takes a generator of user objects and returns the emails of the first 5 active premium users, uppercased.

hints.text: Use .toUpperCase() on the email string in the map callback

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to use array methods on the generator directly
commonMistakes.consequence: Generators don't have filter/map methods - but their Iterator prototype does!
commonMistakes.correction: Generators already have iterator helper methods in ES2025

commonMistakes.consequence: Returns an iterator instead of an array
commonMistakes.correction: Add .toArray() to collect results into an array
